message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this product for $925,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, and this price reflects its true value.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but the product's value is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to come down slightly to $900,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $875,000 for the product. I think this is a fair compromise.
